name: AVSampleBufferRequest.Mode
desc: The modes in which a sample buffer generator processes a request.

items.name: case immediate
items.desc: A mode that indicates that sample buffer creation requests load data as soon as possible.

items.name: case scheduled
items.desc: A mode that indicates that sample buffer creation requests load data according to a scheduled deadline.

items.name: case opportunistic
items.desc: A mode that indicates that opportunistic sample buffer creation requests load data as soon as possible.
